question: Which rapper has the most Billboard #1 hits?
hint: He is considered one of the greatest rappers of all time
explanation: Drake currently holds the record for the most number one hits on the Billboard Hot 100 chart with a total of twenty-one

question: Who was the first female rapper to win a Grammy?
hint: She is often referred to as the Queen of Rap
explanation: Lauryn Hill became the first female rapper to win a Grammy when she won Best New Artist at the 41st Annual Grammy Awards in 1999

question: Which rapper has the most Grammy awards?
hint: He is often referred to as one of the greatest rappers of all time
explanation: Jay-Z has the most Grammy Awards of any rapper with a total of 22 awards

question: Which rapper was the first to win a Nobel Peace Prize?
hint: He is known for his humanitarian efforts around the world
explanation: Akon was the first rapper to be awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 2013 in recognition of his work in providing clean drinking water to millions of people in Africa

question: Which rapper was the first artist to reach 1 billion streams on Spotify?
hint: He is one of the most successful rappers of all time
explanation: Drake was the first artist to reach 1 billion streams on Spotify with his hit single 'One Dance' in 2016

question: Which rapper was the first to reach one billion views on YouTube?
hint: He is one of the most successful rappers of all time
explanation: Eminem was the first rapper to reach one billion views on YouTube with his hit single 'Love the Way You Lie' in 2010

question: Which rapper was the first to be inducted into the Songwriters Hall of Fame?
hint: He is one of the most influential rappers of all time
explanation: Jay-Z was the first rapper to be inducted into the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 2017

question: Which rapper was the first to have an album reach diamond status?
explanation: Jay-Z was the first rapper to have an album reach diamond status with his album 'Reasonable Doubt' in 1996

question: Which rapper was the first to win a BET Award?
hint: He is considered one of the greatest rappers of all time
explanation: Eminem was the first rapper to win a BET Award when he won Best Male Hip Hop Artist in 2000

question: Which rapper was the first to win an Academy Award?
hint: He won for his song 'Lose Yourself'
explanation: Eminem was the first rapper to win an Academy Award when he won Best Original Song for 'Lose Yourself' in 2003
